comments.body: Submitted PR ( https://github.com/jupyterhub/jupyter-server-proxy/pull/105 ) to package the license file in PyPI packages. Have vendored it in the recipe for now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  # Vendoring the license file until the packages include it.
  # xref: https://github.com/jupyterhub/jupyter-server-proxy/pull/105
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Jupyter server extension to supervise and proxy web services
  description: |
